meanings.definition: Having or showing a lack of awareness or understanding; absent-minded.
meanings.sent1: She is the spaciest person I know, always forgetting where she put her keys.
meanings.sent2: The spaciest student in class often daydreams instead of paying attention.
meanings.sent3: In a spaciest moment, he tried to unlock the front door with his car remote.
meanings.sent4: Her spaciest behavior made her seem like she was in a world of her own.
meanings.sent5: The spaciest professor would often lose track of time during lectures.
